subject: DentalTap - Collaborate with your colleagues
title: Don't lose your patients
feature.descr1: Do you know that 40% of the patients drop-out after the first appointment in average dental clinic? Are you facing the same problem?
feature.descr2: If your drop-out level is lower than 40%, we can lower it even more!
title3: With DentalTap our customers reduced drop-outs to 5% in average
